data.script:
<script>
    import {Badge, Stack} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack.Container
    orientation="horizontal"
    spacing="medium"
    variation="wrap"
>
    <Badge palette="inverse">DEFAULT Badge</Badge>

    <Badge palette="inverse" shape="circle">
        CIRCLE Badge
    </Badge>

    <Badge palette="inverse" shape="pill">
        PILL Badge
    </Badge>
</Stack.Container>
data.title: Badge Shape
